name: GC 180 XT
short_description: GG 180 XT or as some have called it, the "holy grail of weight loss". It is one of the most popular and efficient herbal supplements in the industry. It offers the widest range of benefits ever seen in a product of its kind and little to no side-effects at all since it is 100% natural with not even a single artificial ingredient/additive whatsoever. One of the most impressive features of this imcredible product is the ability to offer users effortless weight loss. GC 180 XT makes use of Hydroxycitric acid, HCA for short, which is a chemical compound found in a tropical tamarind fruit and also extracted from it. The hydroxycitric acid or HCA is found more specifically in the peel/rind of the Gambooge fruit, a tropical fruit first discovered in Indonesia but that can also be found in Africa, Southeast Asia or India. summary: GC 180 XT is Most Useful in Diets
